examples: I enjoy eating a ripe banana.
She packed a banana in her lunch.
He made a smoothie with bananas.
Eu gosto de comer uma banana madura.
Ela colocou uma banana na sua marmita.
Ele fez um smoothie com bananas.

suggested: Why did the banana go to the doctor? Because it wasn't peeling well!
Feeling a sense of sadness when you see a brown and overripe banana, realizing it's gone to waste.
I get so angry when someone slips on a banana peel and falls, causing harm or embarrassment.
Did you know that bananas are technically berries? They are classified as a berry due to their structure and development.
The sweet and distinct aroma of a ripe banana, enticing your senses.
The smooth and slightly yielding texture of a ripe banana when you hold it in your hand.
Bananas are a globally recognized fruit, connecting people through their widespread availability and culinary uses.
